attributes.action: urge Tamworth Borough Council to retain the Treasure Island leisure facility, Castle Grounds, Tamworth in its current form and with the present management and staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to stop closure/redevelopment of Treasure Island leisure facility (in it’s current form as an outdoor and indoor play area for children up to 6 years of age), by Tamworth Borough Council. Treasure Island is a fantastic and unique facility that provides an extremely important indoor and outdoor facility for children of pre-school age. This online petition will be supplemented by a paper petition with the same deadline and details.
